channel.title: When i wear gs i can wear sheild
channel.description: ok i added gs to serv but when i wear it and i click shield it allows me to wear it plz help! :mad:

item.title: When i wear gs i can wear sheild
item.dc:creator: @toxic72 toxic72
item.description:

i can show ints if it helps…

EDIT: also i found out that my serv loads 2h from a dat file and when i open it in notepad it is only boxes

item.title: When i wear gs i can wear sheild
item.dc:creator: @sexy_slay sexy slay
item.description:
@sexy_slay wrote:

Im not sure, but try this:
Open up Item.Java
Search for

public static int twohanded[] = {

Type the code of the 2h weapon into there. Then Save… Then reopen and search Item.Java for the weapon. Make sure that it only shows up for 2h weapons.

NOT SURE if this helped, but this is the first thing that came to mind for me.
Hope it helped
-Sexy slay
